name: Merge Balls - Pool Puzzle
description:
Merge Balls is such a well-designed arcade game. What you need to do is to aim and strike balls with the same color together and make higher level balls.

Keep merging balls, more shooting chance will be gained, try if you can make the highest level of ball.

Features:
- 12 different balls and 12 different pool colors and 12 pool arts;
- Various challenges to use your sexy merging skills;
- portal launch, rainbow time, pinballs...tricky design for you to explore;
- Simple and so comfortably satisfying
